title: Steven Spielberg Clarifies His Surprising Stance on Aliens Ahead of UFO Movie
description: In the build-up to his next directorial venture, Disclosure Day, which once again deals with extraterrestrial beings, Steven Spielberg has shared his views on whether the concept of aliens is fact or myth. title: Nuclear Missile Guard Claims Chilling UFO Abduction and 'Non Human' Encounter at US Base
description: Former Air Force guard Richard Barth alleges four mysterious entities froze him and revealed shocking truths during a Cold War era encounter.

title: “Dismissal of UAP Professors Sparks Academic Freedom Concerns”
description: The recent dismissals of two educators from the University of Asia Pacific (UAP) following pressure from groups of past and present students, over allegations of “Islamophobia” and ties to the former regime, highlight a troubling pattern. These teachers faced resignations, online harassment, and physical attacks without support from the administration.
